subject: URGENT: Regulatory Compliance Issue Impacting Brand Activation
body: We've identified a critical regulatory compliance issue directly impacting our brand activation strategies for Proximus. This requires your immediate attention as Marketing Specialist. The issue involves the latest advertising guidelines released by the Belgian authorities and how some of our current campaigns might be perceived. We've prepared a detailed briefing outlining the specific areas of concern and recommended adjustments. It is imperative that you review it urgently and provide feedback so we can maintain compliance. Failure to address this could lead to legal repercussions and brand damage. The briefing is available via the link below, you need to review it before Wednesday 29 January at 10 hour. Your swift action is essential.
